Examples of Proximity Measures
1.
[Dissimilarity] Distances
– Manhattan distance (L1 distance)
– Euclidean distance (L2 distance)
– Supremum distance (L∞ distance)
2.
[Similarity] Similarity coefficients
– Simple matching coefficient
– Jaccard coefficient
3.
[Similarity] Cosine similarity
4.
[Similarity] Correlation
x = (1, 3, 6, 2, 9, 7, 5, 4, 10, 8) 
proximity?
y = (7, 2, 5, 8, 1, 6, 10, 4, 3, 9)
5.
[Similarity] Mutual information
53
